name: Jelly Plant
description:
Jelly Plant was created for ★ JUNE/JULY JACKPOT JAM ★

The game is about a plant living in the "UnderCold Cave" but one day a mysterious type of plant suddenly bloomed. This plant is destroying the temperature of the cave and needs to be removed.

Controls:

  • A and D or Left arrow and Right arrow (Move Left or Right)
  • Space Bar (Heat Wave)
  • Left Mouse (Aurora) 

NOTE:

Do not use aurora near the red spikes because it will trigger it.

Game Mechanics:

  • Shrinking (There are parts of the cave that can cover you from the heat)

As of this moment, the game only contains 3 levels. If you want me to add more levels or if you have suggestions please comment do it.

Thanks and Enjoy!
